name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-oriented Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in quality assurance testing, automation, and API testing to deliver high-quality software solutions. I have a proven track record of utilizing **collaborative tools** and expertise in **reporting** processes to enhance project visibility and ensure compliance with industry standards. My strong foundation in **automation** practices and familiarity with **ISTQB** methodologies enables me to develop and implement effective testing strategies that drive continuous improvement in software quality.

In my previous roles, I have contributed to building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging my skills in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I am well-versed in full-stack development with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience extends to cloud environments, including **Azure** and **AWS**, where I have overseen enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. Additionally, my expertise in **microservices architecture**, **CI/CD automation**, and developing **machine learning pipelines** positions me to effectively assess application performance and quality across diverse tech stacks.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented comprehensive **test** strategies utilizing Jest, Cypress, PyTest, and Postman, ensuring robust **quality assurance** across both front-end and backend services, covering unit, integration, E2E, and contract testing for numerous applications.
Executed **API** testing and automation scripts to validate the functionality and performance of various microservices, achieving a **95% test coverage** across critical workflows and endpoints.
Collaborated with development teams to integrate **collaborative tools** and **reporting** mechanisms, resulting in transparent project management and efficient communication, significantly reducing reporting time by **30%**.
Monitored and documented test results and defect reports for various projects, utilizing advanced **portfolio management** techniques to track improvements and pinpoint weaknesses.
Led the automation efforts by implementing CI/CD pipelines with tools like GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, facilitating automatic deployments and ensuring that the codebase maintained a **99.9% uptime**.
Conducted periodic reviews and regression tests through the established test strategies, which helped in identifying **100+ critical issues** before production deployment, thereby enhancing system reliability.
Integrated advanced testing methodologies and automation frameworks to streamline the QA process, resulting in faster delivery times and higher customer satisfaction ratings.
Mentored junior QA engineers to adopt best practices in **quality assurance** and encouraged collaborative problem-solving within the team.

Conducted rigorous **API** testing and quality assurance utilizing automation frameworks to ensure software reliability and performance across financial platforms.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **collaborative tools** to maintain clear communication, drive project updates, and streamline the development process for better outcomes in testing scenarios.
Developed comprehensive reporting mechanisms to track software defects and enhancements, facilitating transparent updates for stakeholders and aligning with overall project goals in **portfolio management**.
Implemented **test** strategies in accordance with **ISTQB** standards, ensuring a consistent approach to testing across all phases of the software development lifecycle.
Designed and executed test cases to validate functionality and performance, leading to a 30% increase in defect detection rates prior to production deployment.
Enhanced automation frameworks that reduced testing cycles by 25%, enabling faster time-to-market for critical application updates.
Utilized QA metrics and dashboards to provide insights on quality trends, which informed strategic decision-making across multiple projects.

Ensured high-quality software delivery by implementing **automation** testing strategies for backend and frontend components, leveraging tools like Selenium and JUnit, to meet project deadlines and improve testing efficiency by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and optimize **API** test cases, ensuring robustness and reliability in integration processes, while achieving a test coverage of **85%** across critical functionalities.
Developed comprehensive test plans and executed test cases that adhere to **ISTQB** standards, which improved defect identification rate by **40%**.
Utilized collaborative tools including JIRA and Confluence for effective reporting, tracking of bugs, and management of project updates, enhancing team communication.
Conducted regression, performance, and security tests on dynamic e-commerce applications, ensuring compliance with quality assurance standards and delivering zero critical bugs in production.
Assisted in portfolio management by providing detailed reporting and metrics on test outcomes and system performance, facilitating data-driven decision-making.
Actively participated in continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes, working closely with development teams to ensure seamless integration and delivery of features.
Maintained and updated testing documentation and knowledge base, contributing to a shared repository that empowers team members and fosters a culture of continuous learning.
